Playgym

Fun, unstructured play time in our safe gymnastics environment

What is Playgym?

Playgym is unstructured play time where children can explore our gymnastics equipment in a safe, supervised environment. It's perfect for developing motor skills, building confidence, and having fun!

Age Groups

  • Toddlers (18 months - 3 years): Parent supervision required
  • Preschoolers (3-5 years): Supervised play
  • School Age (5-12 years): Independent play

Schedule

  • Monday - Friday: 9:00 AM - 11:00 AM
  • Saturday: 10:00 AM - 12:00 PM
  • Sunday: 2:00 PM - 4:00 PM

Pricing

  • Single Session: $15 per child
  • 10-Session Pass: $120 (Save $30!)
  • Monthly Unlimited: $80

Ready to Play?

No booking required - just drop in during our playgym hours!
